detail.content: Intervarsity Asian American Christian Fellowship                               Seeking God together at NYU                  Home     About     Large Group     Small Groups     Prayer     Churches     Recordings                     Churches           Here is a sample of only a few of the churches that our members attend:       Redeemer Presbyterian Church   Hillsong Church NYC   Trinity Grace - Chelsea   City Grace Church   New York Chinese Alliance Church   Overseas Chinese Mission   Remnant Presbyterian Church                                       Get Involved    Intervarsity AACF is not affiliated with a church, rather we partner with local churches in expanding campus ministry. AACF will be organizing church hopping trips where we bring new students to various churches around the urban New York area. Many of our members are familiar with these churches, and if you would like to visit one, please contact Diana who will get you in touch with the right people!
